mapper.select:
select slc.* from stock_level2_check_detail slcd left join material_base mb on slcd.material_code = mb.`code` and mb.del_flag = 0
and slcd.del_flag = 0
and mb.`name` like concat(concat('%',#{condition.materialName}),'%')
and slcd.material_code like concat(concat('%',#{condition.materialCode}),'%')
order by slc.create_time desc
